author: danieleditor
title: 14 Microwavable Dinners Are Just Disgusting
text:
Tweet Posted: Sat, 3/11/2017 - 11:35am by Will Weldon 
There aren’t many things more important than food. It's so vital, in fact, that you can even defend yourself with it. That’s why, anytime you can avoid frozen dinners, you should. They’re gross. OBSERVE! 1. 
Look at those depressing fruit snacks. 2. 
I hope those are refried beans… 3. 
The potatoes look like icing. 4. 
What is this, nuggets over rice?! 5. 
This is either a nightmarish impression of an Indian dish, or nightmarish diarrhea. 6. 
The meat looks like the tongue of a very ill man. 7. 
I don’t need to see this cooked to know that it is wrong wrong WRONG!. 8. 
Is this some sort of meat loaf with raisins in it? 9.
